description: Spark Operator and Spark Applications metrics

panels.description: Health status of Spark Operator

targets.expr: sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"sparkoperator.*.controller"})*sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"sparkoperator.*.webhook"})*( sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"spark-history-server.*"} OR on() vector(1)) - 0.5)

panels.title: Operator Status

panels.description: Number of Spark Operator's controller running pods.
panels.title: Active Controller Replicas

panels.description: Shows the number of pods related to the Operator in the namespace
panels.title: Pods Count

panels.description: Shows pod state
panels.title: Pod Status

panels.description: Shows the number of each container restarts in the pod
panels.title: Container Restart

panels.description: Health status of Spark History Server
panels.title: Spark History Server Status

panels.description: Number of Spark History Server's running pods.
panels.title: Active Replicas

panels.description: Shows the number of pods related to Spark History Server in the namespace
panels.title: Pods Count

panels.description: Shows pod state
panels.title: Pod Status

panels.description: Shows the number of each container restarts in the pod
panels.title: Container Restart

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication handled by the Operator.
panels.title: Total apps count

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication spark-submitted by the Operator.
panels.title: Number of submitted apps

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication which are currently running.
panels.title: Running apps count

panels.description: Total number of Spark Executors which are currently running.
panels.title: Running executors count

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication which failed to complete.
panels.title: Number of failed apps

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication which completed successfully.
panels.title: Number of successfully completed apps

panels.description: Total number of Spark Executors which completed successfully.
panels.title: Executors completed successfully

panels.description: Total number of Spark Executors which failed.
panels.title: Failed executors count

panels.description: Shows CPU usage by pods in the namespace
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Shows detailed information about CPU usage by pods in the namespace. 

Click on the pod name to go to the dashboard with the pod detailed information

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", container!="POD", name!="", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod) / sum(label_replace(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace=~"$namespace"}, "pod", "$1", "exported_pod", "(.*)")) by (pod)

panels.title: CPU Usage By Pods

panels.description: The average startup latency of Applications
panels.title: Average startup latency of Applications

panels.description: The average execution time of failed applications
panels.title: Average execution time of failed applications

panels.description: The number of Applications by Start Latency
panels.title: Number of Applications by Start Latency

panels.description: The average execution Time of successful applications
panels.title: Average execution Time of successful applications

panels.description: Shows memory usage by pods in the namespace
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description:
Shows detailed information about memory usage by pods in the namespace. 

Click on the pod name to go to the dashboard with the pod detailed information

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", container!="POD", name!="", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod) / sum(label_replace(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace=~"$namespace"}, "pod", "$1", "exported_pod", "(.*)")) by (pod)

panels.title: Memory Usage By Pods

panels.description: Count of writes/reads completed
panels.title: Conteiner IOps

panels.description: Shows network traffic in bytes per second for the pod
panels.title: Receive/Transmit Bandwidth

panels.description: Shows network packets for pod
panels.title: Rate of Received/Transmitted Packets

panels.description: Shows dropped packets for pod
panels.title: Rate of Received/Transmitted Packets Dropped

title: Spark Operator
